ticket.title: uninitialized constant Mysql::Error
ticket.original-body:
Getting this error when i am using "jdbcmysql" for jruby application with rails.
Getting this error when i am running rake db:create
rake db:migrate is working fine.
Traced and found. May want to have a look.
https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/238
